dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Welcome aboard, dearest passengers!!! I. Have. Arrived!!!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Like the first train breaking the dawn, I shall rush forth with ever-constant vigor!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: To think that the company provideth midday meals…! I am infatuated! I would remain employed here for eons if I could!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I have done mine utmost to take notes during today’s meeting! Behold, I have utilized a great variety of colors to illuminate the writing! With stars and flowers and…

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Have you ridden one of W Corp’s trains, Manager Esquire? Not once?! Hold it, I… Give me a moment.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: What do you think of going on a train trip together, Manager Esquire? I’ll pack our lunch!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Have you seen Mistress Rodya anywhere? I promised her earlier that I would give her an extensive lecture on the history of W Corp, yet she’s nowhere to be found!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Manager Esquire, is it just me, or is this metallic odor tingling my nose prevalent in the air?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Did you know that human life is more resilient than it seems? One may still be breathing even after suffering profuse bleeding and breaking most of one’s bones.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: …and that is how the achievements of W Corp. came to be widely kno— Hm? Manager Esquire?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Will I finally be given an important task?!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Here we go!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I shall rush ahead as would a train!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I’m always ready to speed forward!

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: None shall stop me!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Now seems to be our chance!

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Urk!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Where to next?!

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Manager Esquire! I’ll count on you once this is over!

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Manager Esquire! I did a rather impressive job, did I not?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I am terribly sorry, it was vital that I succeed…

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Now THERE is a valuable asset to the company!

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Have I become a so-called elite?! Promote me, Manager Esquire!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I… shan’t ever give up…
